item.title: Move the VirtualCenter SQL database or migrate the VirtualCenter SQL database to different server.
item.description: VMware released two new handy KB articles about how to move or migratingÂ the SQL VirtualCenter database to different server. To move the database When relocating your SQL database: To move SQL Server databases to a new location by using Detach and Attach functions in SQL Server, see Microsoft KB article http://support.
